attributes.action: Remove all VAT on domestic gas electric and water
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Essential needs for life should not be taxed, you need to eat and therefore it is correct not to have VAT on food, however you also NEED to drink and keep warm to live, therefore there should not be a tax on heating and water

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
